identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a 'Control Room' aesthetic for the Steel City Drag Club. Reject standard SaaS white/blue. Embrace asphalt, neon, and mechanical precision.
principles: Fusion: Pit Stop Telemetry x Retro Arcade UI
Content: Data is the hero (Member stats, Vehicle specs)
Contrast: High-vis neon against deep asphalt

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Key metrics

body.usage: Table data, Form inputs, Labels, Buttons

usage_rules: Background must be dark (Zinc-950 or Black).
Primary color (Orange) used for 'Go' actions and active states.
Secondary color (Yellow) used for warnings or 'Edit' states.
Accent color (Cyan) used for 'Vehicle' related highlights.
Borders should be subtle metal (Zinc-700) unless active.

visual_enhancers.texture: Use the asphalt texture with low opacity (5-10%) overlay on the main background.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'chamfered' corners or thick left-borders (border-l-4) to simulate tickets/folders.
visual_enhancers.glow: Use subtle drop-shadows with color (shadow-orange-500/20) for active elements.
visual_enhancers.glass: Use backdrop-blur-md with bg-black/60 for sticky headers and modals.

layout.dashboard: Bento grid style. High density. No wasted space.
layout.spacing: Tight for data tables (p-2), Generous for containers (p-6, p-8).
layout.container: max-w-[1600px] mx-auto (Wide screen for data visibility).

components.Card: bg-zinc-900 border-zinc-800 border-l-4 border-l-primary shadow-none rounded-sm
components.Button: font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm hover:translate-y-[-2px] transition-transform

hero_bg.description: Blurry neon lights in dark - Use as subtle background overlay for Login or Dashboard Hero

vehicle_card_bg.description: Neon green race car - Use for 'Vehicle Management' section header or card background

member_card_bg.description: Chrome engine details - Use for 'Member Details' section header

texture_asphalt.description: Asphalt texture - Use as a repeating pattern or overlay on the body background

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'frontend/src/index.css' immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update 'frontend/tailwind.config.js' to extend the font family (Unbounded, JetBrains Mono) and colors (Zinc palette + Custom Orange).
3. GLOBAL CSS: Set 'body' background to #09090b and text to #e4e4e7 in 'index.css'. Apply the asphalt texture as a pseudo-element fixed background.
4. SHADCN OVERRIDES: Customize the default Shadcn components in 'src/components/ui' to match the 'Card' and 'Button' styles defined above. Remove rounded-xl, use rounded-sm or rounded-none.
5. LAYOUT: Build the Dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid. Use 'sonner' for notifications.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do NOT use placeholders.
7. LOGO: Since no logo URL is available, create a text-based logo using 'Unbounded' font: 'STEEL CITY [DRAG CLUB]' with the brackets in Orange.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors + texture.
Do not use 'Inter' font. Use 'Unbounded' for headers and 'JetBrains Mono' for UI.
Ensure high contrast for accessibility (Orange on Black is good, but check grey text).
